# dokploy_compose (Data Source)

Fetches a single Dokploy compose stack by its ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the compose stack.

### Read-Only

- `app_name` (String) The app name used for Docker service naming.
- `auto_deploy` (Boolean) Whether auto-deploy is enabled.
- `bitbucket_branch` (String) Bitbucket branch to deploy from.
- `bitbucket_build_path` (String) Build path within the Bitbucket repository.
- `bitbucket_id` (String) Bitbucket integration ID.
- `bitbucket_owner` (String) Bitbucket repository owner/workspace.
- `bitbucket_repository` (String) Bitbucket repository name.
- `branch` (String) GitHub branch name.
- `command` (String) Custom command to run for deployment.
- `compose_file_content` (String) Raw docker-compose.yml content.
- `compose_path` (String) Path to the docker-compose.yml file in the repository.
- `compose_status` (String) Current status: idle, running, done, or error.
- `compose_type` (String) The compose type: 'docker-compose' or 'stack' for Docker Swarm.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the compose stack was created.
- `custom_git_branch` (String) Branch for custom Git repository.
- `custom_git_build_path` (String) Build path within the custom Git repository.
- `custom_git_ssh_key_id` (String) SSH key ID for accessing the custom Git repository.
- `custom_git_url` (String) Custom Git repository URL.
- `description` (String) Description of the compose stack.
- `enable_submodules` (Boolean) Whether Git submodules support is enabled.
- `env` (String) Environment variables in KEY=VALUE format.
- `environment_id` (String) The environment ID this compose stack belongs to.
- `gitea_branch` (String) Gitea branch to deploy from.
- `gitea_build_path` (String) Build path within the Gitea repository.
- `gitea_id` (String) Gitea integration ID.
- `gitea_owner` (String) Gitea repository owner/organization.
- `gitea_repository` (String) Gitea repository name.
- `github_id` (String) GitHub App installation ID.
- `gitlab_branch` (String) GitLab branch to deploy from.
- `gitlab_build_path` (String) Build path within the GitLab repository.
- `gitlab_id` (String) GitLab integration ID.
- `gitlab_owner` (String) GitLab repository owner/group.
- `gitlab_path_namespace` (String) GitLab path namespace.
- `gitlab_project_id` (Number) GitLab project ID.
- `gitlab_repository` (String) GitLab repository name.
- `isolated_deployment` (Boolean) Whether isolated deployments are enabled.
- `isolated_deployments_volume` (Boolean) Whether isolated deployment volumes are enabled.
- `name` (String) The display name of the compose stack.
- `owner` (String) GitHub repository owner.
- `randomize` (Boolean) Whether service names are randomized.
- `refresh_token` (String, Sensitive) Webhook refresh token for triggering deployments.
- `repository` (String) GitHub repository name.
- `server_id` (String) Server ID the compose stack is deployed to.
- `source_type` (String) The source type: github, gitlab, bitbucket, gitea, git, or raw.
- `suffix` (String) Suffix added to service names.
- `trigger_type` (String) Trigger type for deployments: 'push' or 'tag'.
- `watch_paths` (List of String) Paths watched for changes to trigger deployments.
